To begin recording, tap the Record button . To adjust the recording level, move the microphone closer to or farther away from what you re recording. For better recording quality, the loudest level should be between 3 dB and 0 dB . To see more details while you re recording, swipe up from the top of the waveform. Tap the Pause button to stop recording; tap Resume to continue. To review your recording, tap the Play button . To change where playback begins, drag the waveform left or right across the playhead before you tap the Play button . To save the recording, tap Done.

While recording in Voice Memos, you can go to the Home screen and open another app. Note: During recording, Voice Memos will record any sounds produced by you or the movement of your device while you re using the other app. To return to Voice Memos, tap the red bar or the little red icon at the top of the screen.
